data.text: You people of all ethnic groups, listen!
important people and unimportant people,
because what I am thinking is very sensible,
I think about [MTY] ◄proverbs/wise sayings►,
I am not [RHQ] afraid when I am in trouble/danger,
by evil men who trust that things will always go well for them because they are wealthy,
They may be rich, but no one can pay money
because that cost is too great,
with the result that he will live forever
We see that foolish and stupid people die,
Those wise people once had houses on land that they owned,
Even if people are great, that cannot prevent them from dying;
That is what happens to those who foolishly trust in what they have accomplished,
They are certain to die just like sheep,
But it is certain that God will rescue me
So, do not be dismayed when someone becomes rich
because when he dies, he will take nothing with him;
While a rich person is alive, he congratulates himself,
but he will die, joining his ancestors,
Even if someone is great, that cannot prevent him from dying;
